name: Dropto
description:
Description:

In this epic game you play as a robot (not a bomb!) that has to traverse through different obstacles which are randomly generated.

There are multiple different characters to choose from that you unlock as you fall with one secret one if you beat my own high score which is (not yet recorded).

Story:

There was a tale of a mystical ancient relic called called "the blast crystal".

The blast crystal is a one of a kind, rare crystal that grants the user unlimited power, but if you wanted this unlimited power than you have to complete, the blast trials.

The blast trials are a set of dimensions that test you skills such as speed, agility and strength and that's the only way to retrieve the gem and escape the blast trials.

Everyone who has attempted to complete the blast trials has perished but you still remain.

Your the last attempt at getting the blast crystal, the universe depends on you so good luck.

controls:

left arrow = left

right arrow = right

space = dash

I hope you like it as it is my first ever game I have finished (that is not on scratch).
